1c:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl mx-auto","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold mb-8 text-center","children":"Scams to Avoid"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"space-y-4","children":[["$","div","0",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm border-red-200","children":[["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-header","className":"@container/card-header grid auto-rows-min grid-rows-[auto_auto] items-start gap-2 px-6 has-data-[slot=card-action]:grid-cols-[1fr_auto] [.border-b]:pb-6","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-title","className":"font-semibold flex items-center gap-2 text-red-700 dark:text-red-300 text-lg","children":[["$","$L27",null,{"size":"md"}],"Fake Listings"]}]}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6","children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"text-sm text-muted-foreground mb-2","children":"Scammers post attractive apartments at low prices and ask for deposits before viewing."}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-sm","children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Prevention:"}]," ","Never send money before viewing. 1d:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16 bg-muted/30","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl mx-auto","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold mb-8 text-center","children":"Contract Essentials"}],["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":["$","ul",null,{"className":"space-y-3","children":[["$","li","0",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L26",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-green-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"Always get a written contract (contrato de alquiler)"}]]}],["$","li","1",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L26",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-green-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"Contract should specify rent amount, deposit, and payment terms"}]]}],["$","li","2",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L26",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-green-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"Note the condition of all appliances and fixtures"}]]}],["$","li","3",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L26",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-green-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"Clarify who pays for repairs and maintenance"}]]}],["$","li","4",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L26",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-green-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"Understand the notice period for termination (usually 2-3 months)"}]]}],["$","li","5",{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L26",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-green-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"children":"Keep copies of all payments and correspondence"}]]}]]}]}]}]]}]}]}]
1e:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl mx-auto","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold mb-6","children":"The Guarantee (Garantía) Challenge"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-lg max-w-none text-muted-foreground","children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":"One of the biggest challenges for expats is the \"garantía\" - a property guarantee required by most landlords. Traditionally, this means having a local property owner co-sign your lease, which is impossible for most foreigners."}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":["$","strong",null,{"children":"Alternatives include:"}]}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-6 mb-4 space-y-2","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"Paying a larger security deposit (3-6 months)"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Using a garantía insurance company (seguro de caución)"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Finding landlords who accept international guarantees"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Working with expat-friendly agencies"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"Airbnb or temporary housing while you build local connections"}]]}],["$","p",null,{"children":"Many landlords are becoming more flexible with foreigners, especially if you can show proof of stable foreign income and pay several months upfront."}]]}]]}]}]}]
